prompt.0: Bitte übersetze diesen Text von Deutsch nach Englisch: "Felix hat es satt: Ständig ist Mama unterwegs. Doch warum das so ist, will ihm niemand verraten. Für Felix ist daher klar: Seine Mutter ist eine Geheimagentin. Als er an seinem zehnten Geburtstag einen rätselhaften Brief erhält, scheint sich seine Vermutung zu bestätigen. Zusammen mit seiner besten Freundin Lina macht er sich daran, das Geheimnis um Mamas Arbeit zu lüften. Ehe sie sich versehen, stecken die beiden mitten in ihrem ersten spannenden Fall als angehende Geheimagenten."

source_text.0: Felix hat es satt: Ständig ist Mama unterwegs. Doch warum das so ist, will ihm niemand verraten. Für Felix ist daher klar: Seine Mutter ist eine Geheimagentin. Als er an seinem zehnten Geburtstag einen rätselhaften Brief erhält, scheint sich seine Vermutung zu bestätigen. Zusammen mit seiner besten Freundin Lina macht er sich daran, das Geheimnis um Mamas Arbeit zu lüften. Ehe sie sich versehen, stecken die beiden mitten in ihrem ersten spannenden Fall als angehende Geheimagenten.

The text is written in the young adult fiction category and is about a 14-year-old boy named Felix who discovers that his mother is a secret agent. ## Step 1: Identify the main character and the central plot of the story.
The main character is Felix, a 14-year-old boy who discovers that his mother is a secret agent.

## Step 2: Determine the genre of the story.
The story falls under the young adult fiction category.

## Step 3: Identify the main conflict or problem of the story.
Felix's mother is always away on secret missions, and Felix wants to know why. He decides to investigate and uncovers a surprise about his mother's work.

## Step 4: Analyze the plot for any key events or twists that might occur.
Felix receives a mysterious letter on his 10th birthday, which seems to confirm his suspicions about his mother's work. He then teams up with his best friend Lina to uncover the truth about his mother's secret life as a spy.

## Step 5: Determine the stakes for the protagonist and the consequences of the plot.
The stakes for Felix are that he wants to understand his mother's work and feel secure knowing what she does. The consequences of the plot are that Felix and Lina become embroiled in their first exciting case as aspiring spies.

## Step 6: Identify the themes or messages that are conveyed through the story.
The story conveys themes of curiosity, determination, and the importance of friendship in uncovering the truth.

## Step 7: Consider the tone of the story.
The tone of the story is likely to be exciting and suspenseful, with a hint of humor and adventure.

reference_text.0: Felix is fed up: Mom is always on the go. But nobody will tell him why that is. For Felix, it's clear: his mother is a secret agent. When he receives a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, his suspicion seems to be confirmed. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to uncover the secret of mom's job. Before they know it, the two are in the middle of their first exciting case as budding secret agents.
